product_name: Point 65 Tequila Sit-On-Top Kayak - Stern Section - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Point 65 Tequila Sit-On-Top kayak stern section joins the Tequila bow section (sold separately) to form a single sit-on-top kayak that's ideal for lakes, protected coves and slow moving streams.
short_description: The Point 65 Tequila Sit-On-Top kayak stern section joins the Tequila bow section (sold separately) to form a single sit-on-top kayak that's ideal for lakes, protected coves and slow moving streams.
